name: Arnold (itch) (Flipez, juuljuul)
description:
Arnold

A survival game by Flipez and juuljuul

This is our game entry for the GODOT WILD JAM # 37 - INSIDE THE MACHINE

It's the first Game Jam for juuljuul and the third for Flipez and it's the first time we work together as a team to participate in a public Game Jam.

Controls

Nothing much to explain here:

  • Move with Arrow Keys and grab with Space as Player one
  • Move with WASD and grab with CTRL as Player two
  • Add player two by pressing Enter ingame
